The following changes were made to the file:
- Corrected spelling errors (e.g., "Acceptible" to "Acceptable", "Policys" to "Policy").
- Improved grammar and sentence structure for better clarity and professionalism.
- Replaced informal language with more formal and precise terms.
- Ensured consistent terminology throughout the document.
- Clarified certain phrases to remove ambiguity.
